items.content_html: React Social Media App is a lightweight web application built using React.js, designed to facilitate posting and viewing of user-generated content. Users can create new posts by filling out a form that includes fields for user ID, post title, content, number of views, and tags.
items.title: rishibharadwajsai/social-media-app: React Social Media App is a lightweight web application built using React.js, designed to facilitate posting and viewing of user-generated content. Users can create new posts by filling out a form that includes fields for user ID, post title, content, number of views, and tags.
